title: Google\Cloud\Dataplex\V1\Asset\DiscoverySpec\JsonOptions
name: JsonOptions
description:
Describe JSON data format.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataplex.v1.Asset.DiscoverySpec.JsonOptions

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.encoding
params.description: Optional. The character encoding of the data. The default is UTF-8.

params.name: data.disable_type_inference
params.description: Optional. Whether to disable the inference of data type for Json data. If true, all columns will be registered as their primitive types (strings, number or boolean).
